metadata.title: CVE-2019-14692 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
AdPlug 2.3.1 has a heap-based buffer overflow in CmkjPlayer::load() inmkj.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14692` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

adplug-utils - 2.3.3+dfsg-2
libadplug-2.3.3-0 - 2.3.3+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: adplug package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.3+dfsg-2').
